name: Chonk Bear
description:
Bounder Game's submission for the Ludum Dare 45 game jam. The theme for this jam was "Start with nothing". Chonk Bear tasks you with getting your bear's empty belly filled before winter hits. Don't forget to hide in the cave before time runs out!

Controls: WASD to Move. SPACE to Swipe/Eat. Shift to Dash to shake trees.
